itunes:title: Episode 408 - Special Guest Robert Patrick
title: Episode 408 - Special Guest Robert Patrick
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with legendary actor Robert Patrick at his Harley dealership in Santa Clarita to chat about what it was like starring in Terminator, The Unit, why he genuinely loves being on jury duty, how playing the T-1000 cha...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with legendary actor Robert Patrick at his Harley dealership in Santa Clarita to chat about what it was like starring in Terminator, The Unit, why he genuinely loves being on jury duty, how playing the T-1000 changed his life, and why his second greatest pride as an American is owning a Harley Davidson dealership.  Awesome episode.
